intro:
I love to learn new things and experiment with new technologies.
These are some of the major languages, technologies, tools and platforms I have worked with:

items.title: C
items.detail:
University course on learning C (Intro to Programming).  
Binary Exploitation, Reverse Engineering, etc.

items.title: Python
items.detail:
Used for various projects and writing scripts for exploits.  
Wrote [pypwncollege](https://github.com/Zeeshan12340/pypwncollege) and contributed flask code to an [open source project](https://github.com/pwncollege/dojo/commits?author=Zeeshan12340)

items.title: JavaScript
items.detail:
Used React for building this website and NextJS for [twitter clone](https://github.com/Zeeshan12340/twitter-clone).  
Used for other projects requiring a front-end like [revworks](https://github.com/zeeshan12340/revworks)

items.title: MySQL
items.detail: Used a PostgreSQL database for [revworks](https://github.com/Zeeshan12340/twitter-clone), mongoDB for [twitter clone](https://github.com/Zeeshan12340/twitter-clone) etc.

items.title: Docker
items.detail:
Most projects on my github have been dockerized.  
Pushed different images to [docker hub](https://hub.docker.com/u/zeeshan12340)

items.title: React
items.detail: This website was built using React.
